titleStmt.title: The broken heart: or, Davids penance fully exprest in holy meditations upon the 51 Psalme, by that late reverend pastor Sam. Page, Doctour in Divinity, and vicar of Deptford Strond, in the countie of Kent. Published since his death, by Nathanael Snape of Grayes Inne, Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Page, Samuel, 1574-1630.
Snape, Nathaniel.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Meditations upon the 51. Psalme.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
